item.title: MannLabs @2025: The Year in Review
item.description: 2025 has been an exceptional year for the Mann Lab, with major publications in Nature (3), Nature Biotechnology, Nature Genetics, Nature Protocols, Nature Communications, Cancer Cell, Cell, Cell Systems, EMBO Molecular Medicine, and Molecular Cell among others.
